description: This file sets up a FastAPI application using a custom Playground class, configuring it with specific agents and metadata, and runs the server if executed as the main module.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: A class used to configure and serve a playground application with agents and metadata.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Returns the FastAPI app instance configured by the Playground.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Runs the playground application server, optionally with reload enabled.
